      • callRequest

        public static void callRequest(java.lang.String url,
                               java.lang.String postBody,
                               java.lang.Boolean isHeaderRequired)
        callRequest(String, String, Boolean) is to pass the required data so that api call can be initiated.
        Parameters:
        url - - api url
        postBody - - can be null or !null if(@param #postBody != null){ POST request } else { GET Request }
        isHeaderRequired - - can be true/false if (@param isHeaderRequired) { mandatory to pass the the header accessToken (Authorization) } else if(@param !isHeaderRequired) { optional to pass the the header accessToken (Authorization) }
